name: Batteryman Electrical Grid
text:
2 or more Level 4 "Batteryman" monsters
You can treat Level 5 or higher "Batteryman" monsters you control as Level 4 for the Xyz Summon of this card. You do not have to Tribute monsters to Normal Summon "Batteryman" monsters, also you do not have to Tribute monsters to activate the effects of "Batteryman" monsters. This card gains ATK and DEF equal to the ATK and DEF of all "Batteryman" monsters attached to it as Materials.
